column2:
"Yo, <%me>.
Have you seen Echo? If you run into her, could you let me know?"
"What happened? The same thing that always happens. Echo got mad at me for some reason and ran off on her own."
"If I don't keep an eye on her, no one else will. It's a pain running after her every time, though..."

"I need to get back to looking for her.
See you later, <%me>."
